features.featureTitle: Update the DonationSection component to include a UPI payment panel displaying: (1) a UPI QR code image (generated asset) with 'Scan & Pay' heading, (2) the UPI ID '76800701@ubin' as copyable text with a copy-to-clipboard button, (3) a note listing supported apps: Paytm, Google Pay, PhonePe, and any UPI app. Style this panel consistently with the existing maroon/gold palette.

Add a Bank Details card to the DonationSection component displaying the following information with individual copy-to-clipboard buttons for each field: Account Name: Gausiya Ashrafiya Foundation, Account No.: 353901010037412, IFSC Code: UBIN0535397 (Union Bank of India). Include a bank icon in the card header. Style consistently with the maroon/gold palette.

Add a UPI QR code image asset to the Donation Section. The image should be a clean, scannable QR code graphic for UPI ID 76800701@ubin, displayed inside a white rounded card with 'SCAN & PAY' heading and the BHIM UPI branding label beneath it.
